= Components =

|| *Component Code* || *Component Name* || *Function* || *Comments* ||
|| BMA.CR || Cerebellum || Motor coordination || ||
|| BMA.RN || Red Nucleus || Motor coordination || Crawling of babies is controlled by TGA.RN ||
|| BMA.LTN || Laterodorsal Tegmental Nucleus || Modulating sustained attention or in mediating alerting responses || ||
|| BMA.PAG || Periaqueductal Gray Matter || Descending modulation of pain and in defensive behaviour || ||
|| BMA.LC || Locus Coeruleus || Regulate the intensity of responses to salient stimuli || NE Source ||
|| BMA.RP || Raphe Nucleus || Regulate moods, temper anxiety, and relieve depression || Releases 3HT (serotonin) hormone (happiness) ||
|| BMA.VTA || Ventral Tegmental Area || Respond to novel stimuli, unexpected rewards, and reward predictive sensory cues || ||
|| BMA.TGM || Trigeminal Motor Nucleus || Muscles of first branchial arch || Pontine Nuclei, lower face and jaw control ||
|| BMA.ABD || Abducens Nucleus || Conjugated movements of both eyes || Pontine Nuclei ||
|| BMA.VGM || Motor Nucleus of Vagus || Parasympathetic vagal functions in the gastrointestinal tract, lungs || ||
|| BMA.NA || Nucleus Ambiguus || Control muscles of pharynx || on par with BMA.VGM ||
|| BMA.HP || Hypoglossal Motor Nucleus || Control of tongue || ||
|| BMA.FN || Facial Nerve Nucleus || Control of face || Pons ||
|| BMA.RF.MES || Mesencephalic Reticular Formation || Saccades, fixation, gaze holding and vergence || Spaceâ€“time coordinated rapid eye movements ||
|| BMA.RF.PO || Pontine Reticular Formation || Maintenance of alertness and the conscious state || ||
|| BMA.RF.MED || Medullary Reticular Formation || Somatic motor control || ||
